title: The Hideous Sun Demon 1958 | Horror, Sci-Fi Movie | Robert Clarke, Patricia Manning

sources.title: The Hideous Sun Demon 1958 | Horror, Sci-Fi Movie | Robert Clarke, Patricia Manning
sources.description:
The Blaze Of The Sun Made Him A Monster!
After exposure to a radioactive isotope, a scientist (Robert Clarke) turns into a scaly creature everytime he is exposed to sunlight; can his colleagues (Patricia Manning and Patrick Whyte) do anything to help him, or will he turn into a murderous, rampaging lizard monster?

Title: The Hideous Sun Demon (1958)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/L6x67V2PJHQ


Directors: Robert Clarke, Tom Boutross
Writers: E.S. Seeley Jr., Doane R. Hoag, Robert Clarke
Actors: Robert Clarke, Patricia Manning, Nan Peterson, Patrick Whyte

Genres: Horror, Sci-Fi
Release date: August 28, 1958
Budget: $50,000 
Filming location: Long Beach, California
